##  Trivia 

* The name "Loki" may be a reference to [Loki](/wikipediaLoki/), a god in Norse mythology - as well as [Loki](/wikipediaLokiComics/), a villain in the [Avengers](/wikipediaAvengers/) series of comics and films.
